Ragnar: ... so this is Maximal Base. I hope you get to call it home 
soon enough!

He transforms to man mode, revealing his short blond hair. Strangely, 
his hair seems to be made of metal, probably an after effect of the 
surge.

Ragnar: Star Colonel Ragnar to Commander Prime, I have two guests for 
you here.

Katya: And I need to find a scientist that could analize a sample of 
the sphere's ruins.

She transforms, her wolfish mask going down to her chest and revealing 
her beautiful face.

Ragnar: So, how is it to be a Solitaire?

Katya: Not too bad, but I ache to test the weaponry. And your Dire 
Wolf?

Ragnar: The Inner Sphere calls it Daishi -Great Death- for a reason, 
you know!

They both look at each other smiling, marvelling at the technological 
wonders they had become.
